title: Senior Data Scientist
description: Mô tả công việc

Global Fashion Group is the leading fashion and lifestyle destination in growth markets across LATAM, SEA and ANZ. From our people to our customers and partners, we exist to empower everyone to express their true selves through fashion. Our three e-commerce platforms: Dafiti, ZALORA and THE ICONIC connect an assortment of international, local and own brands to over 800 million consumers from diverse cultures and lifestyles. GFG’s platforms provide seamless and inspiring customer experiences from discovery to delivery, powered by art & science that is infused with unparalleled local knowledge. As part of the Group’s vision is to be the #1 online destination for fashion & lifestyle in growth markets, we are committed to doing this responsibly by being people and planet positive across everything we do.
THE TEAM
THE TEAM

The Data Team is an integral part of GFG and is essential to enable a data-driven decision making culture. The Data team sits at the cross-roads of various departments including: Strategic Brand Partnerships, Commercial,  Finance, Product Management, Technology and Platform Services. It is an exciting place to be and allows us to provide unique insights about the business, its environment and the marketplace.
ABOUT THE ROLE
ABOUT THE ROLE
We are looking for Senior Data Scientist who is happy to play across the data spectrum - of data engineering, data science and eventually a bit of data translation of insights to English.
Senior Data Scientist

You should have a demonstrated passion for Data Science in coding, optimizing computational logic, applying data mining techniques, conducting statistical analysis, and building predictive models to enable data driven decision making for the wider business through the art of data empathy. This role will work on some cutting-edge data platforms and algorithms, with an unquenchable need to get things done!
You will be reporting to the Head of Data Science and working with various counterparts in Singapore, Vietnam, Germany, Malaysia and Vietnam.
THE IMPACT YOU’LL MAKE
THE IMPACT YOU’LL MAKE

Your work will have a direct impact on shaping the future of how all the operations and decisions are enabled across 14 countries around the world, and will help run the group more efficiently and be on the leading edge of offering a seamless customer experience.
yc: Yêu cầu công việc

BS/MS/PhD in Computer Science or related technical discipline
5+ years of working experience in a similar role.
Demonstrable knowledge and application of data mining, statistical modeling and machine learning techniques 
Proficient in any of the following programming languages: Python, R, Scala
Experience with SQL and relational databases
Experience with AWS and GCP cloud technologies
Good writing and verbal English communication skills

address: Copac Square Building, 12 Tôn Đản, phường 13, District 4, Ho Chi Minh

title: Data Scientist (Big Data, Python, SQL, Data Enginner)
description: Mô tả công việc
Làm một trong các mảng công việc sau:
Data Scientist
Data Scientist

Phối hợp với nghiệp vụ phân tích vấn đề kinh doanh, phân tích khám phá (EDA), mô hình hóa dữ liệu để tìm ra xu hướng kinh doanh, hình mẫu, bản chất của hiện tượng, hành vi người dùng,…và đưa ra các nhận định trong việc ứng dụng khai thác dữ liệu vào hoạt động kinh doanh tạo ra giá trị. Tư vấn cho nghiệp vụ, đội ngũ BA/DA về hướng triển khai ứng dụng học máy, học sâu vào hoạt động kinh doanh.
Xây dựng mô hình học máy giải quyết các bài toàn phát triển kinh doanh.
Xây dựng luồng ETL tổng hợp dữ liệu, tiền xử lý, trích xuất đặc trưng với định dạng phù hợp với mục đích xây dựng từng loại mô hình.
Nghiên cứu công cụ, giải pháp, thuật toán nhằm xây dựng mô hình học máy, học sâu trên quy mô dữ liệu lớn với Pyspark, Tensorflow/Pytorch,… ứng dụng triển khai các chương trình kinh doanh, marketing, ứng dụng xây dựng hệ thống khuyến nghị, tích hợp gia tăng hiệu quả app/web…
Nghiên cứu thiết kế, cài đặt, tối ưu các thuật toán, công nghệ học máy, học sâu triển khai hiệu quả các bài toán.

title: Data Scientist ( Python, SQL, Database)
description: Mô tả công việc

Với sứ mệnh đưa Viettel “Trở thành đơn vị đứng đầu Việt Nam về ứng dụng phân tích dữ liệu vào hoạt động điều hành, sản xuất kinh doanh”, hiệu quả của các dự án PTDL trong Viettel đang tăng lên từng ngày từng giờ. Từ doanh thu trung bình ~70 tỷ/ tháng năm 2019, đầu năm 2020 con số này đã tăng lên ~250 tỷ/ tháng và đang tiếp tục tăng, khẳng định vị thế của Viettel trong chuyển đổi tổ chức thành tổ chức hướng dữ liệu cũng như ứng dụng PTDL vào hoạt động sản xuất, kinh doanh.

Trở thành thành viên trong Khối CNTT với vai trò Data Scientist, các bạn sẽ được tham gia các khóa đào tạo nội bộ và quốc tế về các bước để ứng dụng PTDL tạo ra doanh thu; được tham gia các dự án thực tế, được sử dụng các công cụ Data Visualization hàng đầu như Tableau, QLik, ... Được trải nghiệm tương tác với lượng dữ liệu khổng lồ (hàng trăm triệu khách hàng, hàng tỷ bản ghi dữ liệu, ....), được xây dựng các mô hình dữ liệu dựa trên các thuật toán học máy, học máy chuyên sâu, ...
Mô tả công việc:
Mô tả công việc:

Xây dựng, đánh giá, fine tune các model ML, statistics để giải quyết use case của dự án theo yêu cầu và giải pháp đã có
Xác định, thực thi các phương pháp chuẩn hoá, biến đổi, tổng hợp, trích chọn dữ liệu phù hợp để xây dựng feature cho các thuật toán ML
Phối hợp với data analyst để thực hiện triển khai sample test / pilot dựa trên output của model
Xây dựng các tài liệu theo quy trình, quy định và các tài liệu khác để trình bày giải pháp, phương pháp xây dựng và sử dụng kết quả của model.

title: Data Scientist
description: Mô tả công việc

We are seeking a highly skilled Data Scientist to join our team and contribute to driving data-driven decision-making across the organization. You will be responsible for extracting valuable insights from complex datasets, developing predictive models, and creating innovative solutions to address business challenges.
Responsibilities:

Data Acquisition and Preparation:

Identify and collect relevant data sources.

Transform data into suitable formats for modeling.

Statistical Modeling:

title: Data Scientist (AI/NLP Engineer)

Develop algorithms for personalizing investment experiences, predicting market trends, and optimizing investment portfolios for individual investors.
Integrate and maintain a financial knowledge base for RAG, ensuring Ensa stays updated with the latest market information.
Conduct research on market trends, historical data, and user preferences to enhance Ensa's recommendation capabilities.
Work on MLOps to deploy and maintain machine learning models in a production environment.
Stay updated with the latest advancements in AI, NLP, quantitative trading.

title: Data Scientist (AI Engineer, ML Engineer)
linh_vuc: Vận Tải, Logistics và Kho Hàng
description: Mô tả công việc

Are you looking to be more than just an ordinary Data Scientist? Do you have what it takes to see where you can improve the lives of others through a great and intelligent system to solve issues and improve life? Do you want your products to be used by millions of users in the world and know immediately how much they love your work?

As a Data Scientist with us, you will utilize a variety of data mining and analysis techniques to generate insights and develop algorithms/models, aiding in product enhancement and informed decision-making across countries. Your ability to turn data into business results and work effectively with diverse teams is crucial. Your passion for machine learning and research will be key in driving better business outcomes.
This role offers a challenging yet enriching experience in a fast-paced startup environment, revolutionizing the logistics industry with your expertise and passion for technology.
Key Responsibilities:
Key Responsibilities:

Develop and implement machine learning, deep learning, and LLM-based solutions to address complex logistic challenges.
Handle and analyze large datasets with a keen eye for detail.
Collaborate across various AI subfields, including tabular data, NLP, and MLOps.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business challenges and objectives, translating complex data into actionable insights.
Contribute to the development and infrastructure of AI projects.
Work on the entire AI project lifecycle, from problem definition to deployment and monitoring.
Proactively propose solutions, conduct independent research, and seek guidance when necessary.
Communicate complex ideas clearly and effectively, both verbally and in writing.

title: HO - Data Scientist (Banking Models)
description: Mô tả công việc

Design predictive analytics and machine learning models for appropriate business functions.
Extract novel insights from internal and public datasets to improve outcomes and economics of banking services.
Provide high-quality and proficient support for the work across the data and analytics spectrum including data collection, analysis, modeling and visualization.

title: Sr AI Research&Engineer(Data Analyst, Python, Database)
description: Mô tả công việc

We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Data Scientist to join our dynamic team. This role involves tackling complex data challenges, developing predictive models, and extracting valuable insights to inform strategic decisions.
The ideal candidate will have a strong background in data science, with proven experience in machine learning, statistical analysis, and big data technologies. You will lead projects from conception to deployment, mentor junior data scientists, and collaborate with cross-functional teams to drive innovation and improve our data-driven decision-making processes.
If you are passionate about leveraging data to solve problems and have a track record of delivering impactful data science solutions, we would love to hear from you.

We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Data Scientist to join our dynamic team. This role involves tackling complex data challenges, developing predictive models, and extracting valuable insights to inform strategic decisions.

The ideal candidate will have a strong background in data science, with proven experience in machine learning, statistical analysis, and big data technologies. You will lead projects from conception to deployment, mentor junior data scientists, and collaborate with cross-functional teams to drive innovation and improve our data-driven decision-making processes.
If you are passionate about leveraging data to solve problems and have a track record of delivering impactful data science solutions, we would love to hear from you.

Responsibilities: 
- Develop and implement advanced statistical and machine learning models to solve complex problems,
Lead the data-driven decision-making process, from data collection and analysis to implementation and monitoring of solutions.
- Manage data science projects, ensuring they meet business requirements and are delivered on time
Mentor junior data scientists, providing guidance and support in their professional development.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business challenges and objectives, translating complex data into actionable insights.
- Stay abreast of industry trends and advancements in data science and machine learning, continuously improving our methodologies and technologies
Responsibilities:
yc: Yêu cầu công việc

Experience: At least 3 years of full-time work experience as AI research and engineer .
Education: A postgraduate degree in computer science, statistics, or a related field.
Technical Skills:
Strong understanding of deep learning techniques and models, particularly in natural language processing (NLP), including embeddings and large language models (LLMs).
Extensive experience in building and deploying NLP solutions such as chatbots and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) question-answering systems.
Proficiency in programming languages such as Java or Python.
Experience with natural language processing and image processing techniques.
Familiarity with big data stacks like Hadoop or Apache Spark.
Database and Systems Knowledge:
Familiarity with NoSQL databases.
Knowledge of enterprise search technologies and recommendation systems.
Soft Skills: Strong communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively across teams.
